import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/sign.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SignUp(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[confirm,setConfirm]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!name||!email||!password||!confirm){alert("Please fill in all fields.");return;}const emailPattern=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;if(!emailPattern.test(email)){alert("Please enter a valid email address.");return;}if(password.length<6){alert("Password must be at least 6 characters long.");return;}if(password!==confirm){alert("Passwords do not match.");return;}alert("Sign up successful!");navigate("/signin");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"PlayCore"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"tagline",children:"Join the fun and play anywhere"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Full Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Confirm Password",value:confirm,onChange:e=>setConfirm(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",children:"Sign Up"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"switch-page",children:["Already have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signin",children:"Sign In"})]})]})});}
